questions.question_body: Who has the right to take the exam for amateur radio Class 1 in the Republic of Bulgaria?
questions.Б: Any holder of Class 2 over 14 years of age
questions.В: Any holder of Class 2, but not earlier than 6 months after obtaining it
questions.Г: Anyone who has successfully completed courses for amateur radio Class 1

questions.question_body: For what period of time is amateur radio Class 1 valid?
Who has the right to appoint and conduct exams for amateur radio class?
questions.Б: The Bulgarian Federation of Radio Amateurs

questions.question_body: What percentage of answers on the written test for amateur radio Class 1 must be correct for the exam to be considered successfully passed?
If you hold amateur radio Class 1, how many radio transmitters are you allowed to operate?
questions.Б: Only one with the exception of radio communications in an emergency situation
questions.Г: Any number, provided they transmit on different bands

questions.question_body: If you allow a visiting radio amateur who has a call sign and whose amateur radio class is lower than yours to operate from your radio station, what privileges does he have?
questions.А: Only the privileges permitted by his amateur radio class
questions.Б: All privileges arising from your amateur radio class
questions.В: Emission class and maximum power permitted for his amateur radio class, but in frequency bands permitted for your amateur radio class
questions.Г: Frequency bands permitted for his amateur radio class, but in emission class and maximum power permitted for your amateur radio class

questions.question_body: Can an amateur radio Class 1 operator become a trustee of a club amateur radio station?
questions.Б: Yes, if he has ten years of experience as an amateur radio Class 1 operator
questions.В: Yes, if he has reached 18 years of age

questions.question_body: What messages are Bulgarian radio amateurs allowed to transmit from an amateur radio station in another country?
questions.А: Signal strength report and station location

questions.question_body: What type of messages may be transmitted during international amateur radio communications?
Under what conditions may a radio amateur accept payment for his radio station being used to transmit messages?
questions.Б: When handling traffic in a disaster situation
questions.В: When a business message from a legally registered company has been transmitted, resulting in profit
questions.Г: When an amateur radio bulletin has been transmitted

questions.question_body: Under what conditions may the owner (trustee) of an amateur radio repeater accept service to other services through the repeater?
questions.А: When the repeater is used with reduced power
questions.В: When serving the Ministry of Internal Affairs

questions.question_body: What is CEPT?
questions.А: An amateur radio class that is internationally recognized worldwide
questions.Б: European Conference of Postal and Telecommunications Administrations
questions.В: A type of transistor operating on the field effect principle
questions.Г: The emission class for packet radio communications

questions.question_body: When may an amateur station in a two-way communication transmit a message in a secret manner (encoded) to keep the message text secret?
questions.А: When transmitting on a frequency above 450 MHz

questions.question_body: What are the restrictions on the use of abbreviations or codes in amateur radio service?
questions.Б: They may only be used if they do not obscure the meaning of the message
questions.Г: Abbreviations are permitted, but not codes

questions.question_body: When are codes that do not have a commonly known meaning, such as five-digit groups, permitted in two-way amateur radio communication conducted with a Bulgarian correspondent?
When are codes that do not have a commonly known meaning, such as five-digit groups, permitted in international two-way amateur radio communications?
On which amateur radio bands, if any, are packet communications permitted?
questions.Г: Packet communications are permitted only via the Internet

questions.question_body: Which frequencies in the 28 MHz band can be used for FM repeaters?
questions.Г: The use of FM repeaters is not permitted on this band

questions.question_body: Which frequencies in the 144 MHz band can be used for FM repeaters?
Which frequencies in the 432 MHz band can be used for FM repeaters?
questions.Г: The use of FM repeaters is not permitted on this band

What are the boundaries of the amateur radio 21 MHz band?
What are the boundaries of the amateur radio 24 MHz band?
If you hold Class 1, on which of these frequencies are you not allowed to transmit?

questions.Г: Not allowed to transmit on this frequency

questions.Г: Not allowed to transmit on this frequency

questions.question_body: Can a radio amateur use a radio transmitter with output power higher than 350 W on 14000 kHz?
questions.А: Only for experimental purposes or when participating in amateur radio contests
questions.Б: If he holds amateur Class 1, has at least 5 years of experience, and has previously provided the Communications Regulation Commission with data on the amateur radio station used
questions.В: When the conditions specified in the above two points are met

questions.question_body: What emission class is an amateur radio Class 1 operator allowed to use on frequency 10.153 MHz?
questions.Г: Not allowed to transmit on this frequency

questions.question_body: If you hold Class 1, on which of these frequencies are you not allowed to transmit?
questions.Г: You are allowed on all three frequencies

questions.question_body: What emission class is an amateur radio Class 1 operator allowed to use on frequency 5700.000 MHz?
questions.Г: Not allowed to transmit on this frequency

questions.question_body: What is emission class A3F?
What is the emission class when an AM transmitter is modulated with a television signal?
What is emission class F3F?
What is the emission class when an FM transmitter is modulated with a television signal?
Which of the ultra-shortwave bands has a designated band for satellite repeating?
What type of amateur station transmits one-way information?
Under what circumstances, if any, does an amateur radio station have the right to automatically retransmit radio signals from other amateur radio stations?
questions.А: Only if its owner is present
questions.Б: Only if it is an amateur repeater
questions.В: Only with the permission of the Bulgarian Federation of Radio Amateurs
questions.Г: It has no right under any circumstances

questions.question_body: What is meant by automatic retransmission?
questions.А: The retransmitting radio station is activated by the received radio signal
questions.Б: The retransmitting radio station is activated by a signal over a telephone line
questions.В: The retransmitting radio station is activated by the control operator
questions.Г: The retransmitting radio station is activated by the call sign transmitted in Morse code

questions.question_body: What does "operating through a repeater" mean?
questions.А: An amateur radio station retransmits the message from its correspondent to a third radio station
questions.Б: Equipment for remote control of a remote radio transmitter
questions.В: The other popular name for "operating through a repeater" is simplex radio communication
questions.Г: Radio communication in which the radio station signals are automatically retransmitted

questions.question_body: Who has the right to use an amateur repeater owned by a private individual?
questions.Б: All radio amateurs who possess a call sign, written permission from the owner, and comply with the conditions of the Rules for the Use of Radio Frequency Spectrum for Radio Equipment from the Amateur Radio Service (the Rules)
questions.В: All radio amateurs who possess a call sign and comply with the conditions of the Rules
questions.Г: Private individuals are not permitted to build amateur repeaters

questions.question_body: Who represents Bulgarian radio amateurs before the International Amateur Radio Union (IARU)?
questions.Б: The Bulgarian Federation of Radio Amateurs
questions.В: Radio amateurs join the International Amateur Radio Union (IARU) individually
questions.Г: No one, as Bulgaria is not yet a member of the International Amateur Radio Union (IARU)

questions.question_body: What rights does a CEPT license give to its holder?
questions.А: To practice amateur radio activity in the Republic of Bulgaria
questions.Б: To practice amateur radio activity in any European country
questions.В: To practice temporary amateur radio activity in European countries that have adopted CEPT recommendations and in countries that have acceded to CEPT decisions
questions.Г: To practice amateur radio activity in all countries that are members of the International Amateur Radio Union (IARU)

questions.question_body: What radio station is the holder of a CEPT license allowed to use outside the territory of the Republic of Bulgaria?
What rights does holding a HAREC certificate give?
questions.А: To practice amateur radio activity in all countries that are members of the International Amateur Radio Union (IARU)
questions.Б: To practice amateur radio activity in any European country
questions.В: To obtain a national license from the administration of a CEPT member country when residing there for a period longer than 3 months
questions.Г: To obtain a national license from the administration of any European country when residing there for a period longer than 3 months
